attributes.action: All public car park machine should give change
attributes.additional_details:
All car park machines should be made to give change.

As by not providing change they are taking money and not returning a service outside of the cost of parking.

For instance you park your car and want to park for two hours at a cost of £1.80. You don't have any change and the local shops will only give change after a purchase. You then have to  pay using £2.00.

However you are only allowed to park for two hours and a ticket would be issued not taking into account the fact that you paid 20 pence more for your parking.

I petition the government to make all car park owners provide machine that give change in order to make the system fair.

 After all you wouldn't pay more for a product than you actually have to.
